description:
Advanced multi-source music streaming + discovery client for desktop. Free, clean, no login, no ads.

muffon is a cross-platform music streaming client for desktop, which helps you listen to, discover and organize music in an advanced way.
It retrieves audio, video and metadata from various Internet sources, such as:
- Last.FM
- VK
- Odnoklassniki
- Yandex Music
- Spotify
- Bandcamp
- Deezer
- SoundCloud
- YouTube Music
- YouTube
- Discogs
- Genius
- MusixMatch
- MusicBrainz
Features
- Add logic for matching audio to playing track
Languages
- Add Spanish language (@Lolabird)
- Add Chinese language (@PoorShawn)
Changes / Improvements
- Add logic for browser tab close on middle click
- Add ordering by creation date for tracks imported from local drive
- Change Emoji picker
- Add logic for using player's fallback sources if track's source audio is missing
- Change track’s video select dropdown items’ image style
- Change source select dropdowns' style
- [API] Remove Discogs source's album type selection on artist albums page
- Add community description modal
- Add empty collection message to account import modals if collection is empty
- Add artist info popups to activity history items
- Add playlist description modal
Fixes
- [API] Fix Spotify's playback not working
- Fix bug when internal links opened in browser on auxclick
- Fix bug when internal links opened in new tab on right click
- Fix bug when player panel's options popup didn't hide on close option click
- Fix bugs with Belarusian / Russian translations in library import modal
- Fix bug when options popup didn't hide when submenu option has been clicked
- Fix bug with missing image in dark mode
- Fix bug with audio bitrate (long loading and blocking player audio)
- Fix bug when app’s “quit” and “reload” shortcuts overlapped system shortcuts
- Fix bug with window maximization on app start in Linuxbrowserview
- Fix bug with saved tracks search if track has no album
Other
- Change Windows installer sidebar (Windows 11)
- Fix bug with Windows installer sidebar image not being displayed (Windows 11) (@xyloflake)
- Add builds for Linux arm64 machines (@gamersi)
- [Flatpak] Improve permissions for better user privacy (@gamersi)
- [Flatpak] Add Support for Hardware Acceleration (@gamersi)
- [Flatpak] Add Support for PipeWire (@gamersi)
- [Flatpak] Add Wayland support (@gamersi)
